StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetMIRSReprocessorMessageView]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Message varchar(100) = NULL, @MessageStatus int = NULL, @MessageEvent int = NULL AS
SELECT M.MCRISS_MESSAGE_ID, P.PERSON_ID, N.NWA_ID, C.CONTRACT_ID, S.SHIP_ID, COALESCE(P.LAST_NAME + ', ' + P.FIRST_NAME + COALESCE(SPACE(1) + P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, SPACE(0)), SPACE(0)) AS FULL_NAME, M.MESSAGE, E.EVENT, MS.STATUS, M.ORGANIZATION_ID, M.MESSAGE_SENT_BY, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(24), M.MESSAGE_SENT, 113), SPACE(0)) AS MESSAGE_SENT, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(24), M.MESSAGE_PROCESSED, 113), SPACE(0)) AS MESSAGE_PROCESSED, CS.STATUS_TYPE, CS.STATUS_CODE, CS.DISPOSITION_CODE FROM MCRISS_MESSAGE M INNER JOIN MCRISS_MESSAGE_EVENT E ON (M.MESSAGE_EVENT = E.MCRISS_MESSAGE_EVENT_ID AND M.MESSAGE = COALESCE(@Message, M.MESSAGE) AND M.MESSAGE_EVENT = COALESCE(@MessageEvent, M.MESSAGE_EVENT)) INNER JOIN MCRISS_MESSAGE_STATUS MS ON (M.MESSAGE_STATUS = MS.MCRISS_MESSAGE_STATUS_ID AND M.MESSAGE_STATUS = COALESCE(@MessageStatus, M.MESSAGE_STATUS)) INNER JOIN PERSON P ON M.MESSAGE = P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER INNER JOIN NWA N ON (P.PERSON_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND N.NWA_ID = dbo.GetMaxNWAID(P.PERSON_ID)) INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON (N.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = dbo.GetMaxStatusID(N.NWA_ID)) LEFT OUTER JOIN CONTRACT C ON N.NWA_ID = C.NWA_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SHIPPER S ON C.CONTRACT_ID = S.CONTRACT_ID
